abilities.name: "Benevolence 仁德 (rén dé) "
abilities.description: During your action phase, you can give any number of on-hand cards to any other player. If you give three or more on-hand cards away in a single phase, you regain 1 unit of health.

partners: Gan Fu Ren (Lady Gan) 甘夫人 (Wife)

abilities.name: "Unmitigated Murder 完杀 (wán shā)" [Enforced ability]
abilities.description: Within your turn, only yourself and players at Brink of Death can use PEACH 桃.

abilities.name: "Descend into Chaos 乱武 (luàn wǔ)" [Single-Use Ability]
abilities.description: During your action phase, you can force all other players to choose between 1 of 2 options:

abilities.name: "Behind the Curtain 帷幕 (wéi mù)" [Enforced ability]
abilities.description: All black-suited tool cards targeted on you will be cancelled.

abilities.name: "First Aid 急救 (jí jiù)"
abilities.description: Outside of your turn, you can use a red-suited card as PEACH 桃.

abilities.name: "Green Salve 青囊 (qīng náng)"
abilities.description: During your action phase, you can discard an on-hand card to cause a player to regain 1 unit of health. Limited to once per phase.

abilities.name: "Dirge 悲歌 (bēi gē)"
abilities.description: Every instance after a player suffers damage from ATTACK, you can discard a card and let that player make a judgement. If the result is:

abilities.name: "Sorrow 断肠 (duan chang)" [Enforced ability]
abilities.description: When you die, you cause the player who kills you to lose all the abilities of one of his/her character cards.

name: Cài Wén Jī (Lady Cai)  蔡文姬

abilities.name: " Seed of Animosity 离间 (lí jiān)"
abilities.description: During your action phase, you can discard a card and select two other male characters. It is then viewed as one of the players used a DUEL 决斗 on the other player. This DUEL cannot be responded to with NEGATE 无懈可击. Limited to once per phase.

abilities.name: " Envious Moon 闭月 (bì yuè)"
abilities.description: At your end phase, you can draw a card.

abilities.name: "Without Equal 无双 (wú shuāng)" [Enforced ability]
abilities.description: After selecting a player as the target of your ATTACK 杀, the target of your ATTACK need to use two DODGE 闪 successively to neutralize your ATTACK. During a DUEL 决斗, your opponent needs to play two ATTACKS successively each time.

abilities.name: "Lightning Strike 雷击 (léi jī)"
abilities.description: Whenever you use or play a DODGE 闪, you can select another player to make a judgement. If the result is the suit of spades, you inflict 2 units of lightning damage to that player.

abilities.name: "Dark Sorcery 鬼道 (gǔi dào)"
abilities.description: Before the judgement card of a player takes effect, you can interchange that judgement card with a black-suited card.

abilities.name: "Femme Fatale 祸水 (huò shuǐ)"
abilities.description: During the action phase, you can expose this character card. Within your turns, if this character card is exposed, other players cannot expose their character cards.

abilities.name: " Impetus for Conflicts 倾城 (qīng chéng)"
abilities.description: During the action phase, you can discard an equipment card and select another player that has both character cards already exposed. You then choose one of that player's character cards and "hide" it (flip it over such that it is in the hidden state).

abilities.name: "Dual Heroes 双雄 (shuāng xióng)"
abilities.description: During your draw phase, you can forfeit drawing cards from the deck and make a judgement instead. You acquire this judgement card, and you can use an on-hand card with the different colour of the judgement card as DUEL决斗 in this turn.

name: Yán Liáng & Wén Chǒu 颜良文丑

abilities.name: "Deathly Counsel 死谏 (sǐ jiàn)"
abilities.description: When you lose your last on-hand card, you can discard 1 card from another player.

abilities.name: "With the Tide 随势 (suí shì)" [Enforced ability]
abilities.description: When another player goes into brink of death, if the source of damage that caused it is from the same Kingdom as you are, draw 1 card from the deck. When a player from the same Kingdom as you dies, you lose 1 unit of health.

abilities.name: "Horsemanship 马术 (mǎ shù)" [Enforced ability]
abilities.description: Your distance calculated to other players is reduced by 1.

abilities.name: "Fearsome Advance 猛进 (měng jìn)"
abilities.description: Whenever your ATTACK 杀 is neutralized by a DODGE 闪 from the target player, you can discard a card from the target player.

abilities.name: "Insanity Axe 狂斧 (kuáng fǔ)"
abilities.description: Every instance after your ATTACK 杀 inflicts damage to your victim, you can select a card in the equipped item area of your victim and relocate it to your equipped item area, or discard it.

abilities.name: "Horsemanship 马术 (mǎ shù)" [Enforced ability]
abilities.description: Your physical distance to other players is reduced by 1.

abilities.name: "Call of Valour 雄异 (xióng yì)" [Single-use ability]
abilities.description: During your action phase, you can let every players of the same Kingdom as you draw three cards each. If your Kingdom has the least (or amongst the least) number of players among all the Kingdoms in play, you regain 1 unit of health.

abilities.name: "Celebrity 名士 (míng shì) "
abilities.description: Whenever you receive damage, if the source of damage has hidden character cards, the damage is reduced by -1.

abilities.name: "Comity 礼让 (lǐ ràng) "
abilities.description: When your cards are discarded into the discard pile, you can give those cards to another player.

abilities.name: "Double Edged 双刃 (shuāng rèn)"
abilities.description: At the beginning of your action phase, you can conduct Points Duel with another player. If you win, it is viewed as you using an ATTACK 杀 on that player or on another player from the victim's Kingdom (this ATTACK will not be considered in calculating the number of ATTACK cards used in your action phase). If you do not win, you action phase is ended.

abilities.name: "Barrage 乱击 (luàn jī)"
abilities.description: During your action phase, you can use two on-hand cards with the same suit as RAINING ARROWS 万箭齐发.

name: Yuán Shào 袁绍
partners: Yan Liang & Wen Chou 颜良&文丑 (Most trusted Generals)

abilities.name: "Heroic Demeanor 英姿(yīng zī)"
abilities.description: When you draw cards during your drawing phase, you can draw one additional card.

abilities.name: "Sow Dissension 反间 (fǎn jiàn)"
abilities.description: During your action phase, you can choose another player to pick a suit. This player then acquires one of your on-hand cards and reveals it to everyone. If the suit of the acquired card is different from the suit he/she had chosen, you cause 1 unit of damage to that player. Limited to once per phase.

abilities.name: "Refuting Death 不屈 (bù qū)"
abilities.description: Whenever your health is reduced by 1 unit while your current unit of health is 0, you can reveal a card from the top of the deck and place it onto your character card. As long as none of these cards have the same number (Ace thru King) displayed, you do not die. If a card is revealed with the same point as another existing card, you enter the Brink of Death.

abilities.name: "Blunt advice 直谏 (zhí jiàn)"
abilities.description: During your action phase, you can place an on-hand equipment card into the equipped item area of another player, and then you draw a card.

abilities.name: "Stabilization 固政 (gù zhèng)"
abilities.description: At the end of other players’ discard phase, you can return a card that was discarded in this phase from the discard pile to that player. If you do so, you can acquire all other cards discarded in this player's discard phase from the discard pile.

name: Zhāng Zhāo & Zhāng Hóng 张昭&张纮

abilities.name: "Heavenly Scent 天香 (tiān xiāng)"
abilities.description: Every instance you receive damage, you can discard an on-hand card with suit of hearts to transfer the damage to another player, then that player draws X cards (X being the units of health that player has lost thus far).

abilities.name: "Rosy Cheeks 红颜 (hóng yán)" [Enforced ability]
abilities.description: Your cards with the suit of spades are viewed as cards with the suit of hearts.

abilities.name: "Marriage 结姻 (jié yīn)"
abilities.description: During your action phase, you can discard two on-hand cards and choose another player (with combined characters as a male) that is not at full-health. That player and you regain 1 unit of health each. Limited to once per phase.

abilities.name: "Warrior Lady 枭姬 (xiāo jī)"
abilities.description: Every instance you lose equipment cards in your equipped item area, you can draw two cards.

abilities.name: "Justice of Heaven 天义 (tiān yì)"

abilities.description: At your beginning phase, if you are not at full health, you can choose between 1 of 2 options:

abilities.name: "Humility 谦逊 (qiān xùn)" [Enforced ability]
abilities.description: When you become the target of STEAL 顺手牵羊 or ACEDIA 乐不思蜀, these cards are nullified.

abilities.name: "Scrutinize 度勢 (duó shì) "
abilities.description: During your action phase, you can use a red on-hand card as AMASS 以逸待勞.

abilities.name: "Altruism 好施 (hào shī)"
abilities.description: When you draw cards during your drawing phase, you can draw two additional cards. If you have more than five on-hand cards as a result, you must give half of your on-hand cards (rounded down to nearest integer) to another player with the smallest number of on-hand cards.

abilities.name: "Alliance 缔盟 (dì méng)"
abilities.description: During your action phase, you can choose 2 players (other than yourself) and discard as many cards as the difference between the number of on-hand cards between these 2 players. Then exchange their entire set of on-hand cards. Limited to one use per phase.

abilities.name: "Self-Mastery 克己 (kè jǐ)"
abilities.description: If you have not used or played ATTACK 杀 in your action phase, you can skip your discard phase for this turn.

abilities.name: "Trojan Flesh 苦肉 (kǔ ròu)"
abilities.description: During your action phase, you can lose 1 unit of health, and then draw two cards.

partners: Zhou Yu 周瑜 ("Trojan Flesh" ploy partner)

abilities.name: "Surprise Raid 奇袭 (qí xí)"

abilities.name: " Close Combat 短兵 (duǎn bīng) "
abilities.description: Whenever you use an ATTACK 杀, you can pick one additional player within your physical distance of 1 as the target of the ATTACK.

abilities.name: " Swift and Deadly 奋迅 (fèn xùn) "
abilities.description: During your action phase, you can discard a card and select a player. The physical distance between you and that player is viewed as 1 till the end of your turn. Limited to once per phase.

abilities.name: " National Beauty 国色 (guó sè)"
abilities.description: During your action phase, you can use a card with the suit of diamonds as ACEDIA 乐不思蜀.

abilities.name: "Displacement 流离 (liú lí)"
abilities.description: When you become the target of an ATTACK, you can discard an on-hand card to transfer this ATTACK to another player within your attacking range. The receiving player cannot be the same player that used the ATTACK.

abilities.name: "Balance of Power 制衡 (zhì héng)"
abilities.description: During your action phase, you can discard up to X cards (X being your maximum health units), then draw the same number of cards. Limited to once per phase.

abilities.name: "Stunning Beauty 倾国 (qīng guó)"

abilities.name: "Goddess Luo 洛神 (luò shén)"
abilities.description: At your beginning of your turn, you can flip a judgement card. If the result is black-suited, you can flip another judgement card, until a red-suited judgement results. After that, you acquire all the black judgement cards.

abilities.name: "Sudden Strike 突击 (tū jī)"
abilities.description: During your drawing phase, you can forfeit drawing cards from the deck. Instead, you acquire one on-hand card each from one to two other players.

abilities.name: "Dauntless 骁果 (xiāo guǒ)"
abilities.description: At the ending phase of another player's turn, you can discard a basic card. If you do so, that player needs to discard an equipment card, or else you inflict 1 unit of damage to that player.

abilities.name: "Rouse the Tiger 驱虎 (qū hǔ)"
abilities.description: During your action phase, you can conduct a Points Duel with a player with more health than you. If you win, that player inflicts 1 unit of damage to another player within his/her attack range of your choice. If you lose, that player inflicts 1 unit of damage to you.

abilities.name: "Eternal Loyalty 节命 (jié mìng)"
abilities.description: After every1 unit of damage you suffer, you can pick a player to replenish on-hand cards such that number of on-hand cards equals his/her maximum health. (Maximum replenishment of 5 cards)

abilities.name: "Blockade 断粮 (duàn liáng)"
abilities.description: You can use a black-suited basic card or equipment card as RATIONS DEPLETED 兵粮寸断. You can use RATIONS DEPLETED on other players within the physical distance of 2.

abilities.name: "Bare-Chested 裸衣 (luǒ yī)"
abilities.description: During your drawing phase, you can draw one card less so that the damage inflicted by your ATTACK 杀 and DUEL 决斗 (when you are the source of damage) is increased by 1. This effect lasts till the end of your turn.

abilities.name: "Godspeed 神速 (shén sù)"
abilities.description: You can choose one or both of the following options:

abilities.name: "An Eye for an Eye 刚烈 (gāng liè)"
abilities.description: Every instance after you suffer damage, you can flip a judgement card. If the judgment result is not hearts, the source of damage needs to choose between 1 of 2 options:

abilities.name: "Retaliation 反馈 (fǎn kuì)"
abilities.description: Every instance after you suffer damage, you can acquire a card from the source of damage.

abilities.name: "Envy of Heaven 天妒 (tiān dù)"
abilities.description: After your judgement card takes effect, you can acquire the judgement card.

abilities.name: " Bequeathed Strategy 遗计 (yí jì)"
abilities.description: After every 1 unit of damage you suffer, you can view the top two cards of the deck, give one card to a player, then give the remaining card to a player.

abilities.name: "Ferocious Assault 强袭 (qiáng xí)"
abilities.description: During your action phase, you can either lose 1 unit of health or discard a weapon card to inflict 1 unit of damage to another player within your attacking range. Limited to once per phase.

abilities.name: "Entrenched 据守 (jù shǒu)"
abilities.description: At the end phase of your turn, you can draw three cards, then you stack your character cards.

abilities.name: "Scavenge 行殇 (xíng shāng)"
abilities.description: You can acquire all the cards of players that died.

abilities.name: "Banish 放逐 (fàng zhú)"

abilities.name: "Villainous Hero 奸雄 (jiān xióng)"
abilities.description: Every instance after you suffer damage, you can acquire the card that inflicted damage on you.

abilities.name: "Giant Elephant 巨象 (jù xiàng)" [Enforced ability]
abilities.description: BARBARIANS南蛮入侵 have no effect on you. When any BARBARIANS 南蛮入侵 used by other players is placed into the discard pile after all damage has been resolved, you acquire it.

abilities.name: "Fearsome Blade 烈刃 (liè rèn)"
abilities.description: Every instance after you inflict damage to your target by using ATTACK杀, you can conduct a Points Duel with that target player. If you win, you acquire a card from that player.

abilities.name: "Dragon Heart 龙胆 (lóng dǎn)"
abilities.description: You can use or play your ATTACK 杀 as DODGE 闪, and vice versa.

name: Zhào Yún 赵云
partners: Liu Shan 刘禅 (Rescued at the Battle of Changban)

abilities.name: "Insanity Streak 狂骨 (kuáng gǔ)" [Enforced ability]
abilities.description: After you inflict 1 unit of damage to a player within physical distance of 1, you regain 1 unit of health.

name: Wèi Yán 魏延
partners: Huang Zhong 黄忠 (Colleague since serving Han Xuan 韩玄)

abilities.description: During your action phase, you can use an on-hand card with the suit of clubs as IRON SHACKLES铁索连环, or to re-draw 1 card.

abilities.name: "Resurrection 涅槃 (niè pán)" [Single-use ability]
abilities.description: When you are at the Brink of Death, you can discard all of your cards (on-hand and equipped) and all cards in your pending area, then reset your character card such that it is unstacked and unshackled, draw three cards, and regain your health to 3 units.

name: Páng Tǒng 庞统
partners: Younger Zhuge Liang 卧龙诸葛亮 ("Dragon-Phoenix" Combination, Good Friend)

abilities.name: "The Smoking Gun 祸首 (huò shǒu)" [Enforced ability]
abilities.description: BARBARIANS 南蛮入侵 has no effect on you. You are the source of damage caused by BARBARIANS 南蛮入侵.

abilities.name: "Arise Again 再起 (zài qǐ)"
abilities.description: During your drawing phase, if you are not at full health, you can forfeit drawing cards from the deck; instead, you display X cards from the top of the deck (X being the units of health you have lost thus far). For every card with hearts suit displayed, you regain 1 unit of health, then you discard those cards and acquire the remaining cards.

abilities.name: "Horsemanship 马术 (mǎ shù)" [Enforced ability]
abilities.description: Your distance and range when calculated to other players is always -1.

abilities.name: "Iron Calvary 铁骑 (tiě jì)"
abilities.description: After selecting a player as the target of your ATTACK 杀, you can make a judgement. If the result is red-suited, the target cannot respond to this ATTACK with DODGE 闪.

abilities.name: "Relish 享乐 (xiǎng lè)" [Enforced ability]
abilities.description: When other player selects you as the target of ATTACK 杀, he/she needs to discard a basic card, or else that ATTACK 杀 has no effect you.

abilities.name: " Fearsome Archer 烈弓 (liè gōng)"
abilities.description: After selecting a player as the target of your ATTACK 杀 in your action phase, you can disallow this ATTACK 杀 to be responded with DODGE 闪 under the following circumstances:

name: Huáng Zhōng 黄忠
partners: Wei Yan 魏延 (Colleague since serving Han Xuan 韩玄)

abilities.name: "Prudence 淑慎 (shū shèn) "
abilities.description: Whenever you regain 1 unit of health, you can let another player of your Kingdom to draw 1 card.

abilities.name: "Divine Wisdom 神智 (shén zhì) "
abilities.description: At the beginning of your turn, you can discard all your on-hand cards. If by doing so, the number of your discarded cards is not smaller than X, you regain 1 unit of health (X equals to your current health).

name: Gān Fū Rén (Lady Gan) 甘夫人

abilities.name: "Assembling Wisdom 集智 (jí zhì)"
abilities.description: When you use a non-time-delay tool card that is not converted from other cards, you can draw a card.

abilities.name: "Genius 奇才 (qí cái)" [Enforced Ability]
abilities.description: There is no distance restriction on tool cards used by you.

name: Huáng Yuèyīng 黄月英
partners: Elder Zhuge Liang 暮年诸葛亮 (Husband)
Younger Zhuge Liang 卧龙诸葛亮 (Husband)

abilities.name: "Berserk 咆哮 (páo xiāo)"
abilities.description: During your action phase, you can use any number of ATTACK 杀.

abilities.name: "Warrior Saint 武圣 (wǔ shèng)"
abilities.description: You can use or play a red-suited card as ATTACK 杀.

abilities.name: "Eight Trigrams 八阵 (bā zhèn)" [Enforced Ability]
abilities.description: If there is no armour card in your equipped item area, it is viewed as you have EIGHT TRIGRAMS 八卦阵 equipped.

abilities.name: "Arson 火计 (huǒ jì) "
abilities.description: During your action phase, you can use a red-suited on-hand card as BLAZE 火攻.

abilities.name: " Scient 看破 (kàn pò)"
abilities.description: You can use a black-suited on-hand card as NEGATE 无懈可击.

name: Younger Zhūgě Liàng 卧龙诸葛亮
partners: Pang Tong 庞统 ("Dragon-Phoenix" Combination, Good Friend)

abilities.name: "Star Gazing 观星 (guān xīng)"
abilities.description: At the beginning phase of your turn, you can view X cards from the top of the deck (X being the number of players still alive in the game, and cannot exceed 5). Place any number of these cards, in any order, on the top of the deck . Place the remaining cards, in any order, at the bottom of the deck .

abilities.name: "Empty City 空城 (kōng chéng)" [Enforced Ability]
abilities.description: An ATTACK 杀 or DUEL 决斗 will be cancelled if you have become the target and you have no cards on-hand.

name: Elder Zhūgě Liàng 暮年诸葛亮
